CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 13+6 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy) (Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are a family . They were born in DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , and live in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of PERSON ( “ the ORG ” ) ordered , inter alia , the management of the ORG unitary enterprise “ CARDINALth Military Plant ” ( “ the company ” ) to provide the applicants with a suitable dwelling , while keeping their names on the list of persons awaiting housing .
CARDINAL . On DATE the judgment came into force .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated as the company had no available residential accommodation .
CARDINAL . On DATE , due to the reorganisation of the company ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) , the enforcement file was sent to ORG for LOC .

CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs ruled that it was impossible to enforce the judgment in the part relating to the housing , as the new debtor , FGUP CARDINAL ORG ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) , had no available accommodation . The enforcement proceedings were terminated .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Engelsskiy ORG , following the bailiffs’ application , replaced the debtor in the enforcement proceedings from FGUP CARDINAL TSARZ to OAO CARDINAL ORG ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG clarified the judgment of CARDINAL DATE stating that the applicants should be provided with an apartment in GPE .

CARDINAL . Several times in DATE the parties applied to ORG for changing the mode of enforcement of the judgment . Each time the courts rejected the applications finding that a payment of the amount representing the cost of an apartment would be equal to modifying the original judgment .
CARDINAL . The judgment of CARDINAL DATE remained unenforced .

CARDINAL . The company was incorporated as a municipal unitary enterprise . According to its articles of association , the company ’s aim was to produce goods and render services for ORG of GPE , as well as for meeting other public needs and making a profit .

CARDINAL . Under the Order of the Federal Agency for ORG dated DATE the company was joined to ORG CARDINAL ORG ( ORG QUANTITY Tsentralnyy Avtomobilnyy Remontnyy Zavod – ФГУП CARDINAL ORG or ФГУП CARDINAL Центральный Автомобильный Ремонтный PERSON ) . The reorganisation was completed on CARDINAL DATE , and the latter company became the universal successor of the company .

CARDINAL . In accordance with the Decree of the President of GPE of DATE and the Decree of ORG of DATE , FGUP CARDINAL ORG was further reorganized into OAO CARDINAL ORG , a publicly - traded private open joint - stock company incorporated under the laws of GPE .
